name: In Bounceland
description:
A philosophical and formative journey, through a land of bouncing.

Traverse the world of Bounceland and solve the devious puzzles and accept the lack of control that brings.

The game is a physics based puzzle platformer where you control a very bouncy block. The game focuses on a form of energy bar, where your energy is depleted after a certain number of action, but I will stop myself there.

The game should take roughly 15 minutes to play.
